TextAsset.value: Don't join a club.
JOIN THE CRIMINAL JUSTICE CLUB
NO WAY THAT’S TOO DANGEROUS!
JOIN AL’S CLUB
DO NOT JOIN AL’S CLUB
(Oh, there’s that really cool kid. Alfonso.)
(Didn’t figure he’d go in for a club.)
Oh, uh, hey.
Hey, you’re the new kid.
Lookin’ for a way out of detention, huh?
Y-yeah, yup. That’s me.
So, uh, what’re, uh, you. Um. In for?
Me?
Oh, I go where the trouble is.
(Maybe he’s like one of those kids who always gets in trouble!)
(He looks a little old, come to think of it.)
(M-maybe he got into so much trouble he had to…)
(...REPEAT A GRADE!!!)
Heh. Yeah. I know how that is.
Yeah.
You look it.
Name’s Alfonso B. Tross. Which is totally plausible.
Most folks just call me Al B. Tross for short.
Or Al for shorter. As in Capone.
(Wow, Capone like the gangster?)
(Gosh!)
You should think about joining my criminal justice club.
You’d fit right in with that devil may care attitude of yours.
(Wait. Are they crime fighters?)
(TEENAGE crime fighters?!)
I, uh. Yeah
(Gotta keep sounding aloof and cool just to keep up with Al though!)
Yeah, I’ll think about it.
I mean. Maybe. If I feel like it.
Heh.
I read you, ${slot:playerName}.
Loud and clear.
Um, I’ll think about it.
I mean. Maybe. If I’m not super busy being cool and aloof all over the place.
Heh.
I get’cha.
Welcome back. Change your mind?
Um, yeah, no. I don’t think so.
Heh.
If that’s the way you wanna play it.
Offer to be Aki's assistant.
Wish her luck.
Hang out with Aki?
Hey ${slot:playerName}! How can I help you?
I was just wondering what you were up to.
Oh! I'm managing my club memberships. I use a spreadsheet to keep track of every club I'm enrolled in.
(She has a lot of paper in her hands... )
How many pages is that spreadsheet?!
(WHAT!)
How do you have time to be in so many clubs?!

Oh, silly. Being in all the clubs isn't a problem. It only starts to get stressful when I'm trying to prepare for finals AND I'm practicing for the school play AND it's the peak of Wrestleball season.
Wh... What???
Also, sometimes I'm campaigning for class president...
But that's it! Hahahaha!
That's it huh...
Well, not exactly. I usually have one or two after school jobs... Like being an idol! That's when it gets REALLY crazy.
What are you saving for?! College?!
College? It's so I can still pay my bills during unpaid internships. On-the-job experience is very important.
(I NEVER THOUGHT OF THAT)
And that's all on top of some of my... Other responsibilities.
(HOW ARE YOU ALIVE)
H-how can you do all of that?!
Well, I take my time on earth very seriously.
Although sometimes it does get to be a little much... Hahahahaha!
You need an assistant! Or maybe a half-dozen clones of yourself...
Tomari already tried that... And who would EVER want to be my assistant?! An unpaid position, I should point out.
I'll do it! I'm sure this will be some great on-the-job experience!
I know, ridiculous right? Hahahaha!
Wait... You will?!
Wait, no... I can't. Bad idea!
No way! This is going to be great!
(Being Aki's assistant... Might be my ticket out of detention.)
(If all of these bad kids in detention rub off on me, I'll be a delinquent forever.)
(Besides, I could learn so much from her!)
This is definitely the best idea I've ever had!
Aha... Hahahahaa..... Haaaaa.... Well, I don't need an assistant, but... Maybe we can hang out.
(CLOSE ENOUGH... I WILL be your assistant, Aki! You need all the help you can get!)
Well... Good luck with all of that stuff!
Thanks! Hahahaha. But as Hiromi says, luck's got nothing to do with it.
(Hmm… it seems like Aki is juggling a lot. Should I offer to be her assistant?)
Go to Poetry Club?
I'll take my chances...
What club DO you recommend?
I can't control... This thing inside of me... This... This...
Monster?
Huh?! No...
I was talking about breakfast...
What're YOU talking about?
Er, nothing.
Listen, I have to join a club...
And I was thinking of Poetry Club.
Poetry Club's full of nice people...
And ME.
Uh.
I can't stop you... But I can't recommend it.
I'll take my chances...
It's for the best. You don't want to be anywhere near....
Wait what?
I wanna try Poetry Club. Sounds fun.
Oh... Well... I can't ... I shouldn't take you there. I can't be held responsible for what happens if you're within 50 feet of me...
(Is he talking...
About a restraining order?!)
But if I walked in the direction of the club and you just HAPPENED to follow me... That'd probably be okay...
Ummm... Okay. So I should follow you
but pretend like I'm not following you?
Yeah.
Okay.
Um... I'M LEAVING NOW. GOLLY, I SURE HOPE NO ONE FOLLOWS ME...
Er... NOW I'M WALKING IN THE EXACT SAME DIRECTION FOR NO PARTICULAR REASON...
Sheesh...
Well... what club DO you recommend?
ANY other club is safe... Poetry Club is my dark place... My secret place.
Aren't there like... A bunch of other people in the club?
Y-yeah...
Maybe you should be in DRAMA club.
Huh?
Nevermind.
I can’t recommend Poetry Club… because it’s where my murk lurks.
Join Max's club
Max is too nerdy for me!
Okay I'll join!
Adios Nerdlinger.
AHH!
(Sheesh, this poor kid’s a bundle of nerves!)
Oh, whew.
You caught me by surprise.
Sorry, I didn’t mean to startle you.
What made it extra surprising is that you managed to surprise me at all!
I have the three-hundred and sixty degree spatial awareness of a fighter pilot.
So, I’m very difficult to surprise.
(I dunno, seemed pretty easy to me and I wasn’t even trying!)
Uh, yeah. That’s cool.
Yeah, I think so too!
Oh, I’m Blue Max by the way.
I’m ${slot:playerName}.
What were you working on in detention? Homework?
This? Oh, no.
I never do homework, that’s how I ended up in there!
No, that was my secret project I can’t tell you about.
(But...didn’t he JUST tell me about it…?)
It’s for the Military History Club. If I finish it, that’ll show some school spirit and get me out of detention a little faster.
Couldn’t you have done your homework instead of the secret project? And then not gotten INTO detention in the first place?
But then I wouldn’t be working on the secret project!
Ah, yes. How silly of me.
It really was!
But that’s okay, you seem nice.
You should join my club! It’ll get you out of detention faster and you can help out with the project.
We meet at NOON HUNDRED HOURS!
...I don’t think that’s how time works?
Haha! You just don’t know your military lingo like I do.
That’s noon o’clock for you civilians.
(That’s not quite right either, but I get the idea.)
(Max looks like he could use a friend. And he’s kinda cute. In a nerdy way. And his project might be fun too!)
Yeah, let’s do it.
(Ehhh, Military History? Sounds like a lot reading. Why don’t I just sign up for extra classes? It’s cool that he likes that stuff, but no thanks!)
H-hey, ${slot:playerName}.
There’s still room in the Military History Club. If, y’know. You wanna join.
But it’s okay if you don’t.
(Max looks like he could use a friend. And he’s kinda cute. In a nerdy way. And his project might be fun too!)
Yeah, let’s do it.
Hm, I don’t think so, Max.
Wait, I wanted to look around some more…
Yeah, I’m not interested in any of these.
(Joining a club and showing school spirit to reduce my detention sentence…)
(I wonder if there’s any other students from detention that are taking up the offer?)
(None of these clubs seem interesting…)
(And I don’t want to pretend to be friends with someone just to get out of detention.)
(I shouldn’t be trying to avoid my punishment...)
(I did something wrong, and I should accept the consequences. This is what reform is all about!)
Join Davesprite in the Webcomics Club?
Yes
No
(There’s that boy again…
Davesprite.
He said he was a “game guide”, whatever that means.
He seems kind of crazy, actually…
But there’s also something compelling about him…
He’s like… an angel. I’ve got to find out more ….
(hey ${slot:playerName} check it out
i can put parentheses around my text and narrate my inner thoughts too
also no way im an angel because angels arent sexy
youd think naked people with wings=instant hotness but nah
they hella judge you if you want to get freaky so its like a psychological turnoff
obviously)
Davesprite…
You’re just floating there, staring at me…
Say something! You’re freaking me out.
(whoah you actually cant hear me when im doin parentheses?
this is just thoughts?
messed up)
uh hey sorry about that
do you want to hang out with me today
its cool if not you can click on whoever you want i seriously dont care
Well, I’m looking for a club to join. What club are you in?
uh lets see
it doesnt really matter anyway but
i guess im in the webcomics club or something
yeah that sounds awesome
you take dorky comic books and you take the internet
known hive of nerds
and combine them
and its so lame it crosses back over into ironic coolness
which is pretty much ultimate coolness right there
there is literally no way to top that
yeah are we doin this or not
ok cool let’s go hang out in the club room or something
That sounds pretty cool.
Join Donko in the school band club?
Yes!
I need some time!
Hi, honey!
Don’t think that just because you’re the new kid, I’m gonna go easy on you!
Tee-hee! Just kidding!
I’m totally harmless… Unless you’re some cute shoes on sale.
So… I guess you’re probably in the fashion club or something, huh?
U-um…
I guess I have to join a club, so I can have less detention…
I’m desperate to get away from that scary King guy.
Like, are you joking?!
King is TOTALLY FABULOUS!
Leopard spots are making a comeback this year!
Haha…
I obviously don’t know much about fashion.
Maybe a fashion club wouldn’t be a great choice for me.
Kind of a bummer, then…
I thought it might be fun to be in a club with you!
...You can still be in a club with me…
I’m not in Fashion Club… I’m in…
*indistinct mumbling*
What was that? I didn’t catch that…
OMG! I’m in Band, okay?!
(Band… Drum…
I should’ve known…)
I know it’s a really dorky club to be in…
Don’t join up with me! It’s too embarrassing!
(Lucky for me…
Donko is even cuter when embarrassed.)
Have you made up your mind yet?
Like, for real, you shouldn’t join Band Club with me…
I’d seriously be soooo embarrassed!
(Why is Donko even in Band if it’s so “embarrassing”?
I guess there’s only one way to find out…)
JOIN THE DRAMA CLUB!
RUN ABORT GIVE UP!
GO FOR IT STUPID
WAIT WHO AM I WHAT’S MY NAME AAAAAAH
(Gosh, there’s Galaga Ship at the Drama Club booth.)
(Wonder if it meant what it said about me auditioning for the play!)
(Heck. Wonder if I could even remember my lines?)
Um.
H-hey, Galaga Ship.
I was just, y’know. For detention.
Heh. We gotta. Y’know. Join a club or something or whatever.
Um. Yeah.
Heh.
And I thought. Maybe, y’know?
With the Shakespeare.
Like you said.
(${slot:playerName}, you’re not even talking in complete sentences anymore!)
Um. And stuff.
Ahem.
(Oh, MAN. I am bombing big time.)
(I should just walk away while Galaga Ship still has no idea what my name is and just thinks of me as that little weirdo it hates forever.)
Oh. New kid?
Sorry, I’m supposed to be manning the booth or whatever.
But I was listening to space radio on my internal speakers.
I THOUGHT MAYBE DRAMA THE CLUB TO JOIN IT.
(What did I just say?!?!)
Um. Y’know. I gotta join a club and all, so…
Hm? Oh, right. Detention.
Yeah.
Well, we hold auditions in the auditorium. Good luck.
I uh um.
THANK YOU GOODBYE THOUGH!
Um. Y’know. I gotta join a club and all, so…
Well, we hold auditions in the auditorium. Good luck, I guess.
Join the Auto Club?
Yeah!
Maybe next time...
Hey Hiromi!
Hey kid.
What club are you in again?
Auto Club.
Cool.
Coming?
!!! Yeah!
(She actually addressed me! I'm a little shocked.)
(Oh... She's leaving! Better follow her.)
Maybe next time...
Okay.
(I wish she was a little more enthusiastic... But it's kind of nice to not feel any pressure from a person either.)
Join Jane Crocker at the school paper?
Yes!
Let's look at other clubs first.
Hello there, person-I-have-never-met-before!
You seem like the type to be looking for a club to join.
(Oh, it’s just Jane… wearing a novelty mustache?!
Does she really think that would fool me? She otherwise looks exactly the same.
Heh, that’s pretty cute. I’ll play along.)
Oh yes, hello, dapper young mustached gentleman. I am looking for a club, in fact!
Hoo hoo hoo! Surprise! It was me, Jane, all along!
SEE?!
Oh my gosh! Jane, that was YOU?!
You know, ${slot:playerName}, you need to work on your observational skills.
That silly old disguise should have been quite easy to see through!
You don’t say.
Perhaps you should consider joining MY club! :B
I happen to be the editor of the Namco High school newspaper.
What do you say? I could always use a new mudraker!
(Raking mud sounds REALLY difficult!
But maybe I should join. She seemed so skeptical before, but if she’s reporting on events around the school…
She’s BOUND to see that weird stuff goes on here!)
What’s the word, ${slot:playerName}? We haven’t got all day!
Hooray! Let’s get started!
Join Lolo in the Yearbook Club?
Sure!
I need some time to think about it...
Hey, ${slot:playerName}.
Oh, so you’re deigning to talk to me now?!
Seriously? You’re gonna hold a grudge because I was moody earlier?
Is that really worth the effort?
Okay...I guess I was being a little sensitive...
(She still seems moody, though?)
So what school club were you thinking of joining?
Not that it really matters.
Uhh... well, I’m not crazy about the idea of joining a club at all.
But I guess it’s better than staying in detention all the time.
So I guess maybe...
Yearbook club?
It seems kinda like a cushy club, anyway.
I can probably relax and not stress too much about it.
… Heh.
What?
What’s up?
That’s... actually the club I’m in.
O-Oh!
I’m sorry!
I didn’t mean to suggest it was a less-serious club...
Oh relax, cupcake.
I joined it for the exact same reason you just said.
You’re right, by the way. It’s a total cakewalk.
Haha... well, great minds think alike I guess!
Don’t push it.
Heh... heh....
…..ehhh.
…. Whatever.
Made up your mind yet?
Not that I care...
Join Meowkie as a Hall Monitor
Think it over
Oh, hiya Boss!
Nice to see ya out and about!
Have you decided on a club yet? Our school has lotsa good ones!
I haven’t picked one yet, no…
I remember you saying you’re a Hall Monitor though, right?
I guess that counts as a club too?
Aw Boss, that’s sweet…
You don’t gotta pretend to be interested in my club, though!
I know it’s not as exciting as some of the other ones we got...
I’m not pretending to be interested, really!
I wanna hear about being a Hall Monitor. Please tell me!
Nyaa… Well, actually…
I gotta lot of thoughts about it. Mostly that...
Bein’ a Hall Monitor is really, really great!
It counts as a club, so it keeps ya outta detention...
But you also get to help keep the other kids outta detention too!
You help everybody, not just yourself!
You know, Meowkie, that’s really noble of you.
R-really, Boss?
Yeah! You’re making me want to be a Hall Monitor too.
Don’t worry, Boss! Take all the time ya need to think it over.
I’ll be here if ya change your mind...
B-but, don’t worry!
I’ll understand if ya want to pick some other club!
S-so, whaddya say, Boss?
You didn’t really wanna be a Hall Monitor with me…
Or did you?
Nyaa! Wow, really? You want to be a hall monitor with...
with someone like me?
Boss, I can’t tell ya what this means to me...
D-don’t worry! I’ll show ya the ropes!
Okay, sure, why not!
I need some time to think about it.
${slot:playerName}! ${slot:playerName}! Omigosh!
Have you picked a club yet?!
I’m still deciding.
I guess… Maybe Art, or something-
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
Um?
I need you!
Y-you…
Need me?!
Yes! To help found the Digging Club with me!
No one else will join with me, and the school rules say it’s not an official club unless at least two people are in it.
I need you to come with me, so we can found the Digging Club together!
If it’s an OFFICIAL SCHOOL CLUB, Dad can’t stop me from participating…
Cuz for school stuff, he has to act like a normal principal would, and not do stuff just because he’s my dad.
So if I can’t found this club, I’ll never be allowed to dig again and then I don’t know
what
I’ll do!
Die, probably! Can you die from not digging enough?!
I’m pretty sure you can! I read a thing on the
thing!
Ummm…
Pleeeaaase help me start a Drilling Club, ${slot:playerName}?
Pleeeeaaaase?!?!
That’s great! Thank you thank you thank you!
I’ll give you a few minutes to go collect all your digging supplies!
UM….
Join the Magic Club?
I don't really get what you're saying, but magic sounds cool!
I'm not really the world-saving type...sorry.
Do you believe in that kind of thing?
Absolutely! And ghosts too!
I certainly admit that there are things I can't explain...
It's all bunk!
It's you! If we're talking again, then that rules out all of these possibilities...
In fact, some of these side quests are definitely out of the question now.
All of the endings involving dark forces of various types are still open, though.
(She's... crossing out a whole bunch of things written in her notebook there.)
(I should introduce myself...)
My name is ${slot:playerName}. I'm a roller.
A what? Is that a job class?
Huh? No, I'm, uh, an...
aspiring collector of cultural detritus.
Nice to meet you... Nidia, was it?
How'd you know my name?!
Can you see... it?!
Do you know if I ... I ...
You can really see it?! The FUTURE?!
N-no, not at all ... Mr. King and Principal Dig Dug called your name during roll. I have a completely average memory...
So I happened to remember.
Average INT, huh?
Huh?
(Wait... Is she calling me stupid?!)
Speaking of which... King has unusually high INT for a Barbarian class.
My memory's not so good... Maybe my INT is too low? I probably should have spent more time grinding.
... Grinding?!
Yeah, like dungeons and stuff.
I think my memory's bad because I keep trying to remember FORWARD.
Professor Tomari keeps telling me I can't do that, but I dunno... Seems possible.
And his INT is really high. I try to make a point of listening to him.
(This Tomari sounds like a reasonable person ... )
I wanted to ask him more, but he went back to designing something called a 'super battlebot'.
(OKAY SCRATCH REASONABLE)
What were you just asking me, anyway? Do I know if you... what?
It's nothing! I'm Nidia! It's my destiny to save the world!
Come with me to the library if you want to join magic club!
(Her introduction... Was a little more impressive than mine... )
I don't really get what you're saying... But magic sounds cool!
Hooray! TO THE BOOKSCAPE!
Y-you can just call it the library...
I'm not really the world-saving type... Sorry...
That's okay... We should all be free to choose...
If you change your mind, I'll be here.
I hope you’ll join the magic club!
(Maybe she’ll tell me what she means when she says it’s her destiny to save the world… )
Join the Culinary Club??
Yes!
Keep looking.
(Culinary Club, huh? I could learn to make cakes whenever I wanted!)
(No one is at the booth though.)
(Maybe they’ve got a brochure I can take…)
${slot:playerName}
(Is that…?)
Thinking about joining the Culinary Club that’s great hey I don’t have time for small talk, so here’s the pitch.
You should join the Culinary Club.
BAM!
Oh, to hang out and learn recipes and stuff?
That’s one way to put it.
Mostly I want to observe you until I can work up a complete dossier on your strengths and weaknesses in case you’re an end boss in the big conspiracy.
(Note to self. Richard Miller is a little strange.)
(Then again, at Namco High, I guess that means he fits right in…)
Um, yeah. Sure. Why not?
(Someone around here has got to be a little less crazy. Right…?)
So. You in?
DON’T ANSWER OUT LOUD. They’ll hear you. Blink once for yes and twice for no.
(What the heck. Cakes are cool.)
(BLINK!)
(BLINK BLINK!)
(Sheesh.)
Join the Wrestleball Club with Taira?
Sure, why not.
I need some time to decide.
Hey Cuz! How’s my new best friend doin’?
(Best… friend…?
I guess it’s better than being this guy’s enemy…)
Yo, you’re lookin’ mad confused. What’s up?!
O-oh, it’s… nothing.
I just… can’t decide on a club to join, that’s all!
Heh heh… you know… to get out of detention early...
Oh yo, ${slot:playerName}, it’s so crazy that you’d say that…
Cuz check it! I’ve got the perfect thing.
YOU SHOULD JOIN THE WRESTLEBALL TEAM!
Uhh.... I dunno...
You’re grabbing me a little hard, Taira...
What, you don’t WANNA join the wrestleball team??
Why not? You chicken or something??
Haw haw! O-or maybe you’re just too puny to compete!
That’s it, isn’t it!
Haw! What a twerp!
(What’s this guy’s deal?!
Does he actually like me or not?!)
Haw, whatever! Chicken!
Yo, c’mon though, please??
I... need a minute to think about it...
C’mon, new kid! Join the wrestleball team already!
Unless you’re too much of a DORK! Haw!
C’mon, please join?! PLEASE?!
Join Terezi in the Criminal Justice Club?
Sure! I probably don't have a choice!
No! Resist!
H1 TH3R3 COTTON C4NDY >:]
1 C4N T3LL YOU’R3 LOOK1NG FOR TH3 COOL3ST OF COOL CLUBS TO JO1N
1 C4N SM3LL 1T ON YOU!
But that’s what we’re all doing here, isn’t it?
I mean… it’s Club Day.
SHUSH!!!! YOU C4N’T H1D3 FROM M3 COTTON C4NDY
BUT YOU’R3 GONN4 W1SH YOU COULD!
YOU’R3 JO1N1NG M3 1N TH3 CR1M1N4L JUST1C3 CLUB OK?
NO 4RGU1NG 4LLOW3D, TH4T’S JUST WH4T’S H4PP3N1NG >:]
(I still can’t tell if she’s threatening me or flirting…)
Um, I was gonna look at the other clubs first, s-so…
OH NOOOOOO W444444YYYY
YOU’R3 JO1N1NG MY CLUB!!!
DON’T M4K3 M3 US3 MY F3M1N1N3 W1L3S ON YOU…
H3H3H3!
YEEK!!!
PL34S3 JO1N?
YOU’R3 PR3TTY COOL 4ND 1T’D B3 N1C3 TO H4V3 SOM3ON3 TO SH4R3 TH3 CLUB W1TH
…Oh. THAT’S what you meant by “feminine wiles”?
Just... being nice to me?
I thought you were gonna try to coerce me with violence or something.
H3H3 COTTON C4NDY YOU’R3 SOOOOO W3IRD
OBV1OUSLY 1 S4V3 V1OL3NC3 FOR SP3CI4L OCC4S1ONS >:P
YOU KNOW YOU W4NT TO
1 C4N SM3LL 1T ON YOU >:P
H3H3H3 1 KN3W 1T W4S ONLY 4 M4TT3R OF T1M3
L3T’S GO!!!
(YIKES! She’s grabbing my arm and dragging me…
Whoah, she’s strong!!!)
Join the Engineering Club?
Go for it!
No way!!!
Ugh! That’s not right either.
I’ll never figure it out without my glasses!
ARRRGH!
Whoa there, brainiac. You’ll pop if you keep going like that.
Hm? Who’s there?
What the – I’m right in front of you!
Ah. Yes. I can see you’re roughly person shaped.
If short...
(That’s…a weird thing to say to someone…)
Uh, yeah. I’m ${slot:playerName}. I’m new here.
I’m Yuichiro Tomari: SUPER GENIUS.
That’s…definitely one way to introduce oneself.
For a super genius it is…
THE ONLY WAY.
(This guy is kinda nuts!)
Well, it sounds like this super genius is having fits with his homework.
Ha!
And, did I mention: HA, HAHAHA?
No, what perplexes me isn’t the banal drudgery that passes for homework at this school.
It’s a complex engineering conundrum of my own design!
(Tomari’s got intense feelings about homework.)

You see, the endo-structure needs to be both supported and protected by an interlocking network of nanofiber units to provide locomotion. And it should be conductive to double as the processing strata to self-correct its own balance across the entire range of motion. I can’t take full credit for this brilliant scheme, of course, borrowed as it is from nature.
(I’m not following any of this stuff!!!)
The problem is that I’ve got to invent half the science for it as I go.
Because no one else has.
Indeed, I worry, no one else CAN.
And without my glasses it’s become an endless series of frustrations!
(So, I guess it’s like extra credit then?)
(Hm, better say something so he doesn’t think I’m clueless though!)
Well, uh. That sure is a conununadrumanum all right.
(Uh, that one kinda got away from me but maybe he didn’t notice!)
A what?
(Crud! Think fast, ${slot:playerName}!)
Uh, what you should do is adjust the upper flange valve!
(ACK! I only made it worse!)
THAT’S BRILLIANT!
Yes. Okay. Sure it is. Why not.
You were able to diagnose the exact problem without even knowing what it was!
Yup, and furthermore you can’t prove I didn’t.
You should think about joining the Engineering Club! I don’t mind telling you we could use more students with your aptitude.
Um.
Engineering.
In a club.
With other people.
Who know about engineering.
And stuff.
Mm-hmm. Yeah.
Uh…
(Maybe I’m a natural genius at this stuff. What could go wrong?)
Yeah, let’s do it!
(Ack, no way! This egghead would see right through me.)
Um, I’ll uh get back to you on that one.
(Yeah, when katamari fly!)
I don’t blame you for investigating the merits of the other clubs. Of course, you found them lacking and wish to join the Engineering Club…
Um. Yes. That’s what I did. And want. Yes.
Yeah, investigating. I’m, uh, not done with that yet. Yeah...
